name: Elemental HERO Glow Neos
text:
"Elemental HERO Neos" + "Neo-Spacian Glow Moss"
Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by shuffling the above cards you control into the Deck. Once per turn, during the End Phase: Return this card to the Extra Deck. Once per turn, during your Main Phase 1: You can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; destroy that target, and if you do, apply this effect based on its type. ● Monster: This card cannot attack this turn. ● Spell: This card can attack directly this turn. ● Trap: Change this card to Defense Position.
